Html:
Hi,
I am using this SDK to capture images and save it on my drive. I am not able to change the size of the image from 320 X 240 to 640 X 480 or higher. My code is written in C#. In one of the demo I saw someone using CurrentCamera.CaptureHeight and CurrentCamera.CaptureWidth to set the height and width of the image, however these are ready only properties. Is there any other way to change the size.

Regards,
Sameer
